status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Over this 6‑hour window the turbine was predominantly unavailable, with 37 consecutive 10‑minute intervals in a downtime state, so operational output was limited and relatively steady when present (power_mean ≈0.935 with low variability). Ambient conditions were generally high wind (wind_speed_mean ≈13.2, σ≈1.5) with at least one extreme gust (wind_speed_max 31) and tags indicating elevated temperatures (temp_mean ≈67.8). Control/operational indicators show moderate average pitch (≈4.55), notable mean yaw misalignment (≈9.32), and a positive mean power residual (≈0.063), suggesting output tended to run above the modeled expectation during the periods with data.
